sentence:
Employee Handbook
Employees are required to maintain confidentiality of internal data.
All leave requests must be submitted through the HR portal.
The organization shall review wage policies every financial year.

Safety Policy
Every employee must wear safety equipment in designated zones.
All safety training shall be completed by March 2025.
Supervisors are required to ensure compliance with OSHA standards.
Accidents must be reported immediately to the safety committee.
All personal data must be stored securely and processed lawfully.
Employees shall ensure that personal information is deleted after the retention period.
All data protection incidents must be reported to the compliance officer within 24 hours.

if you have questions or
concerns regarding this statement, you should first contact support@yola.com.

if
you do not receive acknowledgement of your inquiry or your inquiry has not been
satisfactorily addressed, you should contact truste.

if
you are concerned about how your personal information is used, you should
subscribe to our blog rss feed at http://www.yola.com/blog or e-mail us at
support@yola.com.

if you visit a third
party website that is linked to from a yola site, you should read that website's
privacy statement before providing any personally identifiable information.

to receive a free written notice of a security breach, you should
notify us at support@yola.com.
